titles.title: I've Got The Liberty, And You've Got The Liberty

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got the liberty, and you've got the liberty
We've all got the liberty now
Jesus to me has spoken, my chains of sin are broken
I've got the liberty now
I've got the liberty, and you've got the liberty
We've all got the liberty now.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got salvation, and you've got salvation
We've all got salvation now
Jesus to me has spoken, my chains of sin are broken
I've got the salvation now
I've got the salvation, and you've got the salvation
We've all got the salvation now.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I've got the victory, and you've got the victory
We've all got the victory now
Jesus to me has spoken, my chains of sin are broken
I've got the victory now
I've got the victory, and you've got the victory
We've all got the victory now.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I've got the vision, and you've got the vision
We've all got the vision now
Jesus to me has spoken, my chains of sin are broken
I've got the vision now
I've got the vision, and you've got the vision
We've all got the vision now.
